HeroSection.title: International Workshop on Plastic Pollution in the Oceans
HeroSection.subtitle: Oceans in Crisis, Science with Purpose: Transforming Knowledge into Hope
HeroSection.location: João Sampaio Cultural Center, Alagoas - Maceió

ZeroResiduo.title: Zero Waste
ZeroResiduo.subtitle: This event will seek Zero Waste. Participate! Bring your water bottle, cup, pen, block, bag… And Save the Planet!

AboutSection.title: About the Event

section1.heading: II IWPPO 2025
section1.paragraph: IWPPO was born out of the need to discuss and find solutions to one of the greatest environmental challenges of our time: plastic pollution in the oceans. Originating from CEMEIA and supported by CAPES (PAEP), our workshop brings together international experts in an interdisciplinary approach.

section2.heading: Our Approach
section2.paragraph: The workshop combines scientific research, public policies, and technological innovation to address the problem of plastic pollution. With participants from various countries, we promote the exchange of knowledge and practical solutions.

highlights: Endorsed by the UN Executive Committee
Aligned with SDG 14 – Life Below Water

RegistrationSection.title: Registration
RegistrationSection.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and secure your participation in the II International Workshop on Public Policy Research and Social Development.
RegistrationSection.subtitle: Secure your spot
RegistrationSection.additional_info_1: Students must present a valid enrollment certificate.
RegistrationSection.additional_info_2: The payment can be made via PIX, credit card or bank transfer.
RegistrationSection.additional_info_3: In case of withdrawal, the refund is 70% up to 30 days before the event.

LocationSection.title: Location
LocationSection.description: The event will take place at Centro Cultural João Sampaio, located in Maceió, Alagoas.

howToGetThere.title: How to Get There
howToGetThere.publicTransport: Some bus lines pass near the venue such as: 703 and 704. For more information, check the
howToGetThere.airport: Approximately 1 hour by car or taxi.

research.title: Research and Innovation
research.description: Development of technological solutions and innovative public policies.

circular.title: Circular Economy
circular.description: Strategies for monitoring, tracking, and recycling plastic waste.

cooperation.title: Global Cooperation
cooperation.description: Interdisciplinary dialogue and exchange of international knowledge.

education.title: Education and Training
education.description: Capacity building and educational initiatives for sustainable development.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.description: Participatory approaches to involve communities in policy development and implementation.

events.title: Opening Ceremony
events.description: Official opening of the 2nd International Workshop on Public Policy Research and Social Development.

events.title: Keynote Lecture: Public Policy and Sustainability
events.speakers: Dr. João Silva (University of São Paulo)
events.description: Discussion on the challenges and opportunities in implementing sustainable public policies.

events.title: Roundtable: Circular Economy
events.speakers: Dr. Maria Oliveira (UFAL), Dr. Pedro Santos (UFPE)
events.description: Debate on sustainable economic models and their applications in public policy.

events.title: Workshop: Research Methodologies
events.description: Presentation of innovative methodologies for public policy research.

events.title: Research Presentations
events.description: Parallel sessions of scientific paper presentations.

events.title: International Panel: Global Cooperation
events.speakers: Dr. John Smith (Harvard), Dr. Elena Rodriguez (University of Barcelona)
events.description: Discussion on international cooperation initiatives for sustainable development.

events.title: Project Presentations
events.description: Presentation of innovative public policy projects.

events.title: Closing Ceremony
events.description: Official closing of the event with awards for the best papers.
